text.section: In this section, "Fund" means the Partnership Rental Housing Fund.
There is a Partnership Rental Housing Fund.

Subject to the approval of the Legislative Policy Committee and § 7-209 of the State Finance and Procurement Article, after the first 8 months of a fiscal year, the Department may transfer unencumbered money in the Fund among the Partnership Rental Housing Fund, the Rental Housing Programs Fund, the Homeownership Programs Fund, and the Special Loan Programs Fund, if the Secretary determines that demand is:
less than anticipated for the fund from which money is being transferred; and
greater than anticipated for the fund to which money is being transferred.
